qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: Application Types (No. of application types: 45) CRM 8.8, Collaboration 8.5, Project Management 6.2, Marketing 5.3, Accounting/Financial 4.9, Document Management 4.9, BPM 4.6, Productivity 3.6, Content Management 3.3, Business Intelligence 2.9, IT/Application Management 2.8
qualitative_analysis.justification: O artigo apresenta uma ampla gama de tipos de aplicações SaaS (CRM, Colaboração, Gestão de Projetos) distribuídas em múltiplas indústrias, caracterizando um modelo cross-industry focado em clientes empresariais (B2B).

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: Industry Types (No. of industry types: 32) Professional Services 9.8, Technology 9.7, Software 9.2, Banking/Financial Services 7.3, Healthcare 5.8, Government 4.8, Entertainment/Media 4.7, Legal 4.5, Manufacturing 4.3, Education 4.0
qualitative_analysis.justification: A distribuição percentual mostra aplicação em 32 diferentes indústrias, com destaque para serviços profissionais, tecnologia, serviços bancários/financeiros e saúde, caracterizando um modelo cross-industry.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: Firm A develops planning and optimization software for telecom operators
qualitative_analysis.justification: Software de planejamento e otimização para operadoras de telecomunicações indica foco empresarial (B2B) no mercado enterprise.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: Firm B, established in 2000, provides interactive gaming platforms and games-on-demand services
qualitative_analysis.justification: Plataformas de jogos interativos e serviços de games-on-demand caracterizam claramente o foco na indústria de gaming com modelo de plataforma.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: Firm C develops enterprise-SaaS for access rights management. The software can be used in many different types of organizations, including financial institutions and government organizations.
qualitative_analysis.justification: Enterprise-SaaS para gestão de direitos de acesso aplicável a múltiplos tipos de organizações (instituições financeiras, governo) demonstra foco cross-industry e enterprise B2B.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS

qualitative_analysis.justification: Software de modelagem 3D para fabricantes e varejistas de móveis indica aplicação específica de indústria com foco B2B.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Transition to the Cloud: A Vendor Perspective
qualitative_analysis.quote: ERP Co is a leading vendor of enterprise resource planning (ERP), customer relationship management (CRM), and human resource management (HRM) systems in the European market for small and medium sized enterprises (SME).
qualitative_analysis.justification: Sistemas ERP, CRM e HRM direcionados especificamente ao mercado de pequenas e médias empresas (SME) na Europa, caracterizando foco B2B em SME com aplicação cross-industry.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Managing a Software Business
qualitative_analysis.quote: HUGE INDUSTRIES, from the automotive and healthcare industries to finance and entertainment, center increasingly on software.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Digital sustainable business models: Using digital technology to integrate ecological sustainability into the core of business models

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Digital sustainable business models: Using digital technology to integrate ecological sustainability into the core of business models

qualitative_analysis.justification: Cloud computing servitizando a indústria de TI e mudando o ambiente competitivo da indústria de software, caracterizando transformação digital cross-industry com modelo orientado a serviços.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Adjusting software revenue and pricing strategies in the era of cloud computing
qualitative_analysis.quote: Table 2 shows: 'Planning and optimization software for telecom operators', 'Gaming platform and gaming content', 'Risk management software for the financial sector', 'Access rights management software', 'Interactive 3D sales software'
qualitative_analysis.justification: Software para múltiplos setores (telecomunicações, gaming, financeiro, gestão de acessos, vendas 3D), caracterizando aplicação cross-industry B2B.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Designing business models for cloud platforms
qualitative_analysis.quote: Alpha's primary products are enterprise resource planning (ERP) and enterprise data warehouse solutions, but in recent years the company has also entered the cloud market
qualitative_analysis.justification: Produtos ERP e data warehouse enterprise entrando no mercado cloud, caracterizando transição enterprise B2B para plataforma cloud.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Business Models for Cloud Computing: Experiences from Developing Modeling & Simulation as a Service Applications in Industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: The project is industry-based and focuses on four key areas of M&S: Computational Fluid Dynamics, process (discrete-event) simulation, 3D modeling and data analytics...The domains covered by the project include oil and gas industries, engine design and manufacturing, UAV design, general purpose manufacturing, food supply chain, port logistics, shoe insole manufacturing, and inventory control
qualitative_analysis.justification: Modelagem e simulação como serviço cobrindo múltiplos domínios industriais (petróleo, manufatura, supply chain, logística), caracterizando aplicação cross-industry B2B cloud SaaS.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Study on a Decentralized SaaS Business Model
qualitative_analysis.quote: we show our study on a market model of mobile SaaS (Software as a Service) servers in a semi-cooperative environment
qualitative_analysis.justification: Modelo de mercado de servidores SaaS móveis em ambiente semi-cooperativo, caracterizando modelo SaaS mobile emergente.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: how SaaS providers select a proper revenue and pricing model
qualitative_analysis.justification: Seleção de modelos de receita e precificação por provedores SaaS, caracterizando modelo SaaS cloud cross-industry.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Service-Centric Business Model in Cloud Environment
qualitative_analysis.quote: Under the influence of technology trends, most importantly cloud computing, current organizational business models (BMs) are being questioned
qualitative_analysis.justification: Modelos de negócio organizacionais sendo questionados pela tendência de cloud computing, caracterizando transformação digital B2B com infraestrutura cloud e modelo orientado a serviços.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Designing Viable Multi-sided Data Platforms: The Case of Context-Aware Mobile Travel Applications
qualitative_analysis.quote: One promising application area is that of travel applications
qualitative_analysis.justification: Plataforma de dados multi-sided para aplicações de viagem móveis, caracterizando aplicação no setor de turismo com plataforma mobile B2C e monetização baseada em dados.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Designing Viable Multi-sided Data Platforms: The Case of Context-Aware Mobile Travel Applications
qualitative_analysis.quote: app developers can develop applications such as city trip and accommodation planning, traffic update, cultural and entertainment updates and information about the city
qualitative_analysis.justification: Desenvolvedores criando apps para planejamento de viagens, atualizações de tráfego e entretenimento, caracterizando plataforma mobile B2C.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Economic and business perspectives on smartphones as multi-sided platforms
qualitative_analysis.quote: We apply the multi-sided platform model to understand the evolution of the smartphone industry.
qualitative_analysis.justification: Modelo de plataforma multi-sided para entender a evolução da indústria de smartphones, caracterizando plataforma mobile com efeitos de rede e gestão de ecossistema.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Crushing Candy: The Free-to-Play Game in Its Connective Commodity Form
qualitative_analysis.quote: The free-to-play model in particular radically altered the production, distribution, and marketing of game apps.
qualitative_analysis.justification: Modelo free-to-play alterando radicalmente a produção, distribuição e marketing de apps de jogos, caracterizando foco em gaming mobile B2C com freemium.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Effects of Freemium Strategy in the Mobile App Market: An Empirical Study of Google Play
qualitative_analysis.quote: This paper examines the effect of the freemium strategy on Google Play, an online marketplace for Android mobile applications.
qualitative_analysis.justification: Estratégia freemium no Google Play, marketplace online para aplicações Android, caracterizando mercado mobile com modelo freemium em plataforma marketplace.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Network Externalities, Incumbent's Competitive Advantage and the Degree of Openness of Software Start-Ups
qualitative_analysis.quote: analyzes the degree of openness chosen by start-ups when entering the software industry
qualitative_analysis.justification: Grau de abertura escolhido por startups ao entrar na indústria de software, caracterizando foco em startups com efeitos de rede e potencial modelo open source.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: Application Types (No. of application types: 45) CRM 8.8... Collaboration 8.5... Project Management 6.2... Marketing 5.3
qualitative_analysis.justification: Múltiplos tipos de aplicações SaaS (CRM, Colaboração, Gestão de Projetos, Marketing), caracterizando aplicação cross-industry B2B.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: Industry Types... Technology 9.7... Professional Services 9.8
qualitative_analysis.justification: Tipos de indústria incluindo Tecnologia e Serviços Profissionais, caracterizando aplicação cross-industry B2B.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Clarifying the Value Elements of Business Models for Disturbance Management in Supply Chains
qualitative_analysis.quote: The aim of the study is to clarify the value elements of a business model for disturbance management and analysis in supply chains
qualitative_analysis.justification: Modelo de negócio para gestão e análise de distúrbios em cadeias de suprimento, caracterizando aplicação cross-industry B2B com analytics.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The Impact of Open Source Software Commercialization on Firm Value
qualitative_analysis.quote: companies operating in software-related industries from the Fortune Global 500 list
qualitative_analysis.justification: Empresas do Fortune Global 500 em indústrias relacionadas a software comercializando OSS, caracterizando modelo open source enterprise global cross-industry.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The relationship between Open Innovation and Strategy: data-driven analysis of the Mobile Value Services Industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: Mobile Value Services Industry
qualitative_analysis.justification: Indústria de serviços de valor móvel, caracterizando mercado mobile B2C cross-industry.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Open-Source Software Entrepreneurial Business Modelling
qualitative_analysis.quote: This poster aims to facilitate business planning of bootstrapping entrepreneurs who are developing a high-tech business by open-source approach.
qualitative_analysis.justification: Planejamento de negócios para empreendedores desenvolvendo negócios high-tech por abordagem open-source, caracterizando modelo open source para startups cross-industry.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Towards a better Understanding of the Dynamics of Platform as a Service Business Models
qualitative_analysis.quote: PaaS refers to software platforms that have primarily been discussed in the context of cloud computing. According to the most cited architectural concepts of cloud computing, PaaS represents the middle layer, connecting the IaaS and SaaS cloud layers
qualitative_analysis.justification: PaaS como camada intermediária de cloud computing conectando IaaS e SaaS, caracterizando modelo de plataforma cloud B2B.
